keyword: calories in kraft mac and cheese
title: Calories in Kraft Mac and Cheese
meta_description: Learn calories in Kraft Mac and Cheese per prepared serving, plus carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Kraft Mac and Cheese
assumptions: Prepared as directed: 1/3 box dry mix with 4 tbsp margarine and 1/4 cup 2% milk per box, yielding 3 servings (1 cup or 225g each).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by preparation method, brand specifics, milk type, and added ingredients. Check box for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One prepared serving of Kraft Mac and Cheese contains about 420 calories and 10g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk and half the margarine
Prepare with olive oil instead of margarine (1 tbsp per serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Kraft Mac and Cheese?
What are the macros for Kraft Mac and Cheese?
faqs.a: Per serving: 49g carbs, 10g protein, 21g fat, with 710mg sodium.

faqs.q: Calories in a full box of Kraft Mac and Cheese?
faqs.a: A full box prepared makes 3 servings, totaling about 1260 calories.

faqs.q: Is Kraft Mac and Cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one serving has 710mg sodium, about 31% of daily recommended intake.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in Kraft Mac and Cheese?
faqs.a: Use low-fat milk, reduce margarine or substitute with veggies for fewer calories.
